## BatchSwitchUserEnabledStateRequest type

Represents the request for the batch operation that changes the enabled state of users.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BatchSwitchUserEnabledStateRequest = BatchOperationRequest & {
    IsEnabled?: boolean;
};
```
